file_content.text: People of the Old World! Citizens of Zakuul! Prepare yourselves for another stunning day of power and guts and blood! It's time for Mayhem at the Arena Grand!
Back for more, it's the brawler who broke everyone's banks--the Mysterious Stranger!
It's happened twice. Can luck strike a third time for the Mysterious Stranger?
Starting to look like more than luck for our newcomer, people!
O, Mysterious Stranger! From which star could you hail? From where did you learn to fight?
Time and again we have seen the impossible as the Mysterious Stranger notches win after win!
Welcome to Mayhem at the Arena Grand, where you are witnessing history! With six wins, the Mysterious Stranger has yet to be stopped!
People, I had a good feeling about this one from the very start. Give it up for the Mysterious Stranger!
This fight was to be for the title, people--but I've just learned the Mysterious Stranger has a new challenger!
The Mysterious Stranger--from the very start, an unstoppable force on a path to destiny. A true wonder. A champion!
The Mysterious Stranger... actually... won! Incredible!
I remind all Heralds of Zildrog that this was a sanctioned fight complete with death waivers!
Against all odds, it's a second win for the Mysterious Stranger, everyone! Can you believe it? I can't!
Let us have a moment of silent remembrance for our fallen hero.
The Mysterious Stranger wins again! I can't believe it!
What a fight! What! A! Fight! Everyone give a Mayhem cheer to the Mysterious Stranger!
One step closer on the road to Eternal Champion! Ending Nocturno's dark reign--the Mysterious Stranger!
No revenge for you, Arlaia! Victory to the Mysterious Stranger! Next stop--the title!
I don't believe it! I don't believe it! The impossible is now reality! The Eternal Champion is no more!
Big advantage for the Mysterious Stranger!
Mysterious Stranger going for the upper hand....
Grasping desperately at every advantage--that's our challenger.
Aww, the challenger can't hack it!
Smart move....
There's an edge.
Go get 'em, Stranger!
Another one-and-done. Seriously, can we not find a better class of challenger?
Another one falls to Grah and his... things. Let's hope for a better show next time, people!
The Heralds, once again proving why they're the law in the Old World!
Oh! And here it looked like we had a new contender. Goodbye, Stranger--whoever you were.
Another win for the Supreme Vindicator, and another challenger is history!
Gave it a good run, Stranger, but into the waiting claws of Izax you go....
Knight and squire, everyone! Always a pair of show-pleasers!
Arlaia takes her revenge! It's all over for the Mysterious Stranger!
The Eternal Champion reigns eternal--as is his destiny!
Surprising!
Hey, what do you know?
Nice one!
Give the Stranger a hand!
What a hit!
Whoa! Deadly!
As expected, the show's almost over.
Could this be it for the Mysterious Stranger?
Oh no! The Stranger's almost had it!
Giving up after just one fight? Hardly a surprise, is it, people?
The only mystery is why this stranger even bothered to show up!
Not a bad run! Maybe our Mysterious Stranger will return. Who knows? It's a mystery!
But you can't go, Stranger! We need more! More!
Don't run scared from the title fight! You're so close!
Configured and ready to administer a pummeling!
Buckets of bolts!
Inflict maximum damage!
Your survival is beyond all possibility!
Atomize the enemy!
You will nourish my pets for weeks!
Feed! Feed!
We are the threads of your demise.
It is over....
Feel the serpent's bite!
Your life ends here!
Judgment: death!
To the serpent....
You're in over your head!
Just die already!
Not... like this....
Get killing, you ugly beasts!
In honor of Valkorion, I still fight for you, Zakuul!
Is that your best?
Watch as I demolish this fool!
Agh!
For Zakuul!
Gon' kill you!
Make you dead!
Ungh!
Ha ha ha!
Like this one? I call her Little Gut, but she got a big appetite!
Gonna watch you die!
Chompy chompy chompy!
No!
Little Gut's about to be all full!
Justice be upon you!
You'll die slow for that!
You lack discipline!
It's... over....
Soon to be nonexistent!
Like my new look?
Systems... fizzling....
Vengeance protocols engaged!
I am eternal!
My destiny is your death!
You will fall!
Not possible...!
Your climb ends here!
Nocturno! No!
See you soon... my Knight....
So bored!
Come on! Give us a fight!
Looks like Zotar's going to keep the title!
If you ever wondered how much is too much for the Mysterious Stranger--now you know.
Today we bring you a new challenger: hailing from parts unknown, it's the Mysterious Stranger!
Yeah, I don't have high hopes either.
And this match pits our newcomer with the hyper-intelligent technological phenomenon--the deadly Arlaia Zayzen, Master of Killers!
Now give us a fight!
Facing the Stranger this time is the ominous Daruula Grah and his terror-inducing predators from below!
Such a meal they've arranged for you, my children.
Not if the serpent lord Zildrog has anything to say about it! Here come Noble Executioner Gungus Boga and his Heralds of Zildrog!
I will not countenance disrespect!
But now, returning from far-off worlds with some kind of something I can't pronounce--it's the beastmaster you love to hate, Conraad Om'wurt!
You're a goner, friend! I've got evil terrors you've never seen before!
The beastmaster is dead! A day to remember in the Arena Grand, everyone!
Will your skill be enough to defeat the Eternal Empire's most decorated veteran? Here he is, people--Supreme Vindicator Lanos!
Let the fighting begin!
But, Stranger, nothing you ever faced has prepared you for the Breaktown Brawler and his pets--King Crush and Mister Ripper!
Rraaagh!
Will this exotic monster from a backwater world put an end to the streak?
Let's find out!
Now the Stranger faces Mayhem's cruelest duo--Nocturno the Fallen Knight and her bloodthirsty protege, Drake Raven!
It's time for blood?
It is, my squire. To arms!
Obtained from the far reaches of the galaxy comes this wonder of technology--the Doom Droid!
And commanding this monstrosity, her mind snatched from the clutches of death--it's the Master of Killers, Arlaia Zayzen, back for revenge!
Kill me once, that's my miscalculation! Kill me twice--not going to happen!
But to be more than a champion, one must go all the way. One must accomplish the impossible! People of the Old World! Citizens of Zakuul! Are you ready?!
You know him as the Bringer of Death! The High Justice of Pain! The Emperor of Agony! The Exarch of the Old World--your Eternal Champion, Zotar!
It's no mystery why I am called "Eternal Champion"! This stranger is about to see why!
People of the Old World! Citizens of Zakuul! Give everything you've got for your new! Eternal! Champion!
Until he dies.
Until she dies.
Another challenger. Another corpse!
The Fallen Knight lives on--but not without a price!
I'll never forget you, Drake!
The squire surpasses the knight, everyone! A round of applause for the young man!
This is for you, Nocturno!
My sweet pet!
I wasn't done!
